price: Suka ce: "Shin idan mun mutu kuma muka kasance turɓaya da ƙasũsuwa shin lale ne mu haƙĩƙa waɗanda ake tãyarwa ne?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
